scene3Dabstract

Class BoundingBox3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • scene3Dabstract.BoundingBox3D

  • public class BoundingBox3D
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic, immutable bounding box in 3d.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Tatoian, Warren Godone-Maresca

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundingBox3D

        public BoundingBox3D(float x,
                     float y,
                     float z,
                     float width,
                     float height,
                     float length)
        Initializes a bounding box with a given position and size.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point (in world coordinates)
        y - The y coordinate of the point (in world coordinates)
        z - The z coordinate of the point (in world coordinates)
        width - Size along the x-axis
        height - Size along the y-axis
        length - Size along the z-axis

    • Method Detail

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight()
        Accesses the height of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The size of the bounding box along the y-axis in world units.

      • getLength

        public float getLength()
        Accesses the length of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The size of the bounding box along the z-axis in world units.

      • getMaxX

        public float getMaxX()
        Returns the maximum x coordinate of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The maximum value between the x coordinate and the x coordinate plus the width of the bounding box.

      • getMaxY

        public float getMaxY()
        Returns the maximum y coordinate of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The maximum value between the y coordinate and the y coordinate plus the height of the bounding box.

      • getMaxZ

        public float getMaxZ()
        Returns the maximum z coordinate of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The maximum value between the z coordinate and the z coordinate plus the depth of the bounding box.

      • getMinX

        public float getMinX()
        Returns the minimum x coordinate of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The minimum value between the x coordinate and the x coordinate plus the width of the bounding box.

      • getMinY

        public float getMinY()
        Returns the minimum y coordinate of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The minimum value between the y coordinate and the y coordinate plus the height of the bounding box.

      • getMinZ

        public float getMinZ()
        Returns the minimum z coordinate of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The minimum value between the z coordinate and the z coordinate plus the depth of the bounding box.

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        Accesses the width of the bounding box.
        Returns:
        The size of the bounding box along the x-axis in world units.

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(float x,
                        float y,
                        float z)
        Checks if a point contained inside the bounding box.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point (in world coordinates)
        y - The y coordinate of the point (in world coordinates)
        z - The z coordinate of the point (in world coordinates)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the point is inside or on the bounding box.
